transArray.content:
Nice room, clean and tidy, good service
Hygiene: clean

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Thank you very much for your recognition of the service and room hygiene. We are very happy to bring you a good stay experience. The hotel strictly abides by Huazhu Group's room cleaning procedures, and linens are changed after each guest. Once disinfected, we will continue to work hard to provide every guest with a comfortable and secure stay. All hotel staff look forward to your next visit and wish you a happy life. Manager: Zhao Dan
